entries.title_d: Your next assignment is to meet a transport in the Naboo system to receive a package for delivery.
entries.title: Naboo System: Pick Up Package From the Transport
entries.quest_reachpoint_d: Travel to the specified location and await the arrival of the drop-off ship.
entries.quest_location_d: You must meet the transport in the Naboo system.
entries.quest_defendpoint_d: The transport is experiencing hyperdrive difficulties. You must remain at this location until the transport arrives. If attacked, you may defend yourself, but do not leave this area.
entries.outofrange_failed: Talus Station: < You've gone out of range from the transport jump location. They will likely be boarded by the Empire. We're scrapping this mission. >
entries.outofrange: Talus Station: < Be careful. You are moving too far away from the transport jump location. >
entries.mission_complete: Talus Station: < The transport's hyperdrive is repaired. They should be arriving any second now. >
entries.found_loc: Navigation waypoint uploaded. Another standard pickup. Travel to this location and await the arrival of the transport.
entries.first_attack: The Imperial Navy has been monitoring our communications! They have sent an attack wing to intercept you. Defend yourself, but do not leave this area until the transport arrives.
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Enemy craft inbound. Imperial signatures detected. >
entries.arrived_at_loc: The transport's arrival has been delayed due to hyperdrive malfunctions. You must remain within range of this location until the transport arrives. Do no leave this area.
